/**
 * Runtime for the output of `@scale-codec/definition-compiler`
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * Reexports the whole core library and defines codecs for STD types.
 *
 * @packageDocumentation
 */
name: @scale-codec/definition-runtime

members.docComment:
/**
 * @remarks
 *
 * This function shouldn't be in the `DecodeTrace` class itself due to provide a tree-shaking possibility. This is not the main part of this class, but the side tool, used for pretty-print in the console.
 */
members.name: buildDecodeTraceStepsFmt

members.docComment:
/**
 * Special {@link Codec} implementation to that wraps another codec and dispatches it via its getter. With this utility it is easy to implement cyclic dependencies between codecs.
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * TODO optimize and cache got codec after the first dispatch?
 */
members.name: DynCodec
dynCodec

/**
 * Prints tracked info to console
 *
 * @example
 * ```ts
 * import { Logger } from 'lib'
 *
 * new Logger().mount()
 *
 * // use decoding functions and see console output
 * ```
 *
 */
